pages.text: Skip to content Catering We Bring the Meat HOSTING AN EVENT? Let Swig & Swine provide delicious ‘que for your crew. Swig & Swine offers full on-site and off-site catering with delivery for weddings and large events, or it’s easy to place a large order and pick it up for your next tailgate. CATERINGMENU VIEW CATERING MENU (PDF) Full Service Catering Let our catering team take care of all the work so you can enjoy yourself. VIEW CATERING MENU (PDF) Bar Service Catering Options include Beer and Wine or a Full Bar – You Make the Choice! CALL FOR CARRYOUT Contact your nearest location for ordering and pick-up. Skip to content About Sit Back & Relax AT SWIG & SWINE …we believe that nothing is a substitute for hard work and long hours, so we cook our barbecue low and slow, savoring all the natural juices and locking in that iconic smoked flavor. We also believe that hard work deserves a great cold beer, which is why we offer a diverse selection of craft beers (as well as your usual favorites, of course). Sit back and relax with us at any one of our 4 locations across the Lowcountry. ANTHONY DIBERNARDO Pitmaster & Owner Born and raised in Mantua, New Jersey, Anthony DiBernardo has always had a passion for cooking. He entered the culinary world when he was 14 as a banquet cook. Later, the US Navy brought Anthony to the Lowcountry, where he has lived for nearly 25 years. After serving as a cook on the USS Batfish submarine for four years, Anthony began working in the kitchen at Blossom Café. His résumé includes roles as the Executive Chef at Kiawah Island Resort, Corporate Executive Chef at Mustard Seed, and Operating Partner and Head Chef at Rita’s. After incorporating barbecue menu items during each culinary venture, Anthony started his own barbecue catering business, where his passion started to set fire. He opened Swig & Swine BBQ in collaboration with Queen Street Hospitality Group in 2013 and became sole proprietor of Swig & Swine in 2019. ANTHONY DIBERNARDO PITMASTER & OWNER Born and raised in Mantua, New Jersey, Anthony DiBernardo has always had a passion for cooking. He entered the culinary world when he was 14 as a banquet cook. Later, the US Navy brought Anthony to the Lowcountry, where he has lived for nearly 25 years. After serving as a cook on the USS Batfish submarine for four years, Anthony began working in the kitchen at Blossom Café. His résumé includes roles as the Executive Chef at Kiawah Island Resort, Corporate Executive Chef at Mustard Seed, and Operating Partner and Head Chef at Rita’s. After incorporating barbecue menu items during each culinary venture, Anthony started his own barbecue catering business, where his passion started to set fire. He opened Swig & Swine BBQ in collaboration with Queen Street Hospitality Group in 2013 and became sole proprietor of Swig & Swine in 2019. Skip to content Press Awards & Accolades CHECK IT OUT Swig & Swine has impressed visitors and locals alike with their chef-driven concept using only wood as the fuel for its meat-smoking fire. Check out Swig & Swine’s accolades and awards. For media inquiries, please contact us at or call us at Info@swigandswinebbq.com (843)242-9108 AWARDS 2016 Best of Award Best Ribs 2016 Best of Award Best West Ashley Restaraunt 2014 Eater Award Charleston Eater Awards RECENT ARTICLES

Rest assured we use nothing but high-quality hickory, oak, and other hardwoods to smoke to perfection. Call Any Of Our Multiple Locations Across Charleston To Place Your Order TAILGATE PACKAGES Packages Served w/ Bread, Serving Utensils, Plates, Napkins, Silverware, & Cups Package #1 2 lbs Pork, 1 lb Brisket, 1 lb Sausage, 4 Quarts Sides of Your Choice, 2 S&S BBQ Sauces, 2 Gallons Tea FEEDS 10 - 15 PEOPLE $146 Package #2 3 lbs Pork, 3 lbs Brisket, 2 lbs Turkey, 6 Quarts Sides of Your Choice, 2 S&S BBQ Sauces, 3 Gallons Tea FEEDS 20 - 25 PEOPLE $265 Package #3 4 lbs Pork, 2 lbs Brisket, 2 lbs Sausage, 2 lbs Turkey, 2 lbs Pork Belly, 8 Quarts Sides of Your Choice, 3 S&S BBQ Sauces, 4 Gallons Tea FEEDS 30 - 35 PEOPLE $390 PACKAGE ADDITIONS NOT ENOUGH FOOD TO GO AROUND? ADD THESE ITEMS TO ANY PACKAGE ORDER & TAKE A SECOND HELPING! Add Wings 25 for $38 | 50 for $76 75 for $114 | 100 for $152 Add Full Rack of St. Louis Ribs $28 Chafing Dishes & Sterno $14 Each SIDES & SAUCES EXTRA SIDES: PINT $8.00 / QUART $14.00 Mac & Cheese, Baked Potato Salad, Collards, Pickled Vegetables, House Salad, Cole Slaw, Brunswick Stew, Beans w Brisket, Hash & Rice, Vinegar Slaw, Corn Pudding Sweet Red Sauce, Vinegar Sauce, Carolina Mustard Sauce, Alabama White Sauce, Jalapeno Sauce
